attributes.action: Review the National Lottery license in the UK, after unfair changes to the game.
attributes.additional_details: A U.K operation should be at the helm of this, keeping profits within the U.K rather than a Canadian Teachers Pension Fund (I believe this is correct) let's support change, let's support Richard Branson if he would still consider this an option. Let's bring back that Dream of winning to us all! The UK Government win every week through Taxes, so whatever happens it will need to benefit them also. Stand together, use our collective voice, please sign and share otherwise nothing will change.
attributes.background: The Jackpot has not been won since the 14th November 2015. The estimated jackpot will be, £50M on the 6th January 2016. I don't think anybody thought 14 draws would pass without a Jackpot winner. Doubling the price, increasing the range of numbers has made it unfair for players. It needs a review.
